name: pyrotechnic

relating to fireworks: He was struck in the forehead by a projectile in a pyrotechnic accident. The actor sued a movie studio over a pyrotechnic mishap.
impressive; showing great skill: It was a pyrotechnic exhibition of hot technologies. She has knack for conceptualizing, a pyrotechnic intelligence, and a remarkable flair for the dramatic. See
pyrotechnics
